meanings.sent1: The pedicled flower bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The pedicled leaf swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The pedicled fruit looked like it was dancing on the tree.
meanings.sent4: The pedicled birdhouse hung securely from the branch.
meanings.sent5: The pedicled vine wrapped itself around the fence post.

meanings.definition: Attached by a pedicle or pedicel.
meanings.sent1: The pedicled tumor was successfully removed during surgery.
meanings.sent2: The pedicled umbilical cord provided essential nutrients to the baby.
meanings.sent3: The pedicled balloon floated gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The pedicled flag waved proudly in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The pedicled puppet danced on the strings controlled by the puppeteer.
